pacman.api.java
Interface Player

public interface Player

The Player class is the parent class of your AI player. It is just like a template. Your AI player class (called PacPlayer) must implement the following methods.

Author:
e.zhu

Method Summary
 MoveDir calculateDirection(Maze maze, Ghost[] ghosts, Pac pac, int score)
          This is method decides Pacman’s moving direction in the next 16 frames (See Frame Concept).
 void onLevelStart(Maze maze, Ghost[] ghosts, Pac pac, int score)
          This method will be called by the game whenever a new level starts.
 void onNewLife(Maze maze, Ghost[] ghosts, Pac pac, int score)
          This method will be called by the game whenever Pacman receives a new life, including the first life.
 

Method Detail

calculateDirection

MoveDir calculateDirection(Maze maze,
                           Ghost[] ghosts,
                           Pac pac,
                           int score)
This is method decides Pacman’s moving direction in the next 16 frames (See Frame Concept). The parameters representing the maze, ghosts, Pacman, and score after the execution of last frame. The game will call this method to set Pacman’s direction and let him move (see Pacman’s Move) in that direction for 16 pixels in the next 16 frames.

Parameters:
maze - A Maze object representing the current maze.
ghosts - An array of Ghost objects representing the four ghosts.
pac - A Pac object representing Pacman
score - The current score
Returns:
MoveDir

onLevelStart

void onLevelStart(Maze maze,
                  Ghost[] ghosts,
                  Pac pac,
                  int score)
This method will be called by the game whenever a new level starts. The parameters representing the game objects at their initial states. This method will always be called before calculateDirection and onNewLife.

Parameters:
maze - A Maze object representing the current maze.
ghosts - An array of Ghost objects representing the four ghosts.
pac - A Pac object representing Pacman
score - The current score

onNewLife

void onNewLife(Maze maze,
               Ghost[] ghosts,
               Pac pac,
               int score)
This method will be called by the game whenever Pacman receives a new life, including the first life. The parameters representing the repositioned game objects. This method will always be called before calculateDirection and after onLevelStart.

Parameters:
maze - A Maze object representing the current maze.
ghosts - An array of Ghost objects representing the four ghosts.
pac - A Pac object representing Pacman
score - The current score
